column1: Yuzhnouralsk (Russian: Южноура́льск) is a town in Chelyabinsk Oblast
column3: located on the Uvelka River 88 kilometers (55 mi) south of Chelyabinsk. Population: 37

column1: It was founded in 1948. Town status was granted to it on February 1
column2: 1963..  It was one of the towns closest to the hypocenter of the blast from the 2013 Russian meteor event.

column1: Within the framework of administrative divisions
column4: incorporated as the Town of Yuzhnouralsk—an administrative unit with the status equal to that of the districts. As a municipal division
column5: the Town of Yuzhnouralsk is incorporated as Yuzhnouralsky Urban Okrug.
